1714592 THE WORKING JOURNALISTS AND OTHER NEWSPAPER EMPLOYEES (CONDITIONS OF SERVICE) AND MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS (AMENDMENT) ACT, 1996
ACT NO. 34 OF 1996 [ 28th September, 1996]
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Forty- seventh Year of the Republic of India as follows-
An Act further to amend the Working Journalists and other Newspaper Employees (Conditions of Service) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1955.
296765 1Short title. This Act may be called the Working Journalists and other Newspaper Employees (Conditions of Service) and Miscellaneous Provisions (Amendment) Act, 1996.
1297531 2 Amendment of section 9. In section 9 of the Working Journalists and other Newspaper Employees (Conditions of Service) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1955 (45 of 1955.) (hereinafter referred to as the principal Act),-
720324 iin clause (a), for the words" two persons", the words" three persons" shall be substituted;
1173262 iiin clause (b), for the words" two persons", the words" three persons" shall be substituted;
2
1772931 iiiin clause (c), for the words" three independent persons", the words" four independent persons" shall be substituted.
1398964 3 Amendment of section 13C. In section 13C of the principal Act,-
46210 iin clause (a), for the words" two persons", the words" three persons" shall be substituted;
579457 iiin clause (b), for the words" two persons", the words" three persons" shall be substituted,
163231 iiiin clause (c), for the words" three independent persons", the words" four independent persons" shall be substituted. K. L. MOHANPURIA, Secy. to the Govt. of India
